Privacy Policy

Effective: August 30, 2025 • Last Updated: August 30, 2025

Who we are: VibesForce (“we,” “us,” “our”) operates vibesforce.com, a small demo/marketing site that includes a vehicle loan calculator and a contact/lead form. We are based in North America and currently operate only in the United States and Canada.

Important: This site is for demonstration and educational purposes only. We are not a lender or broker. We do not make real credit offers directly, all the offers are generated by our partners.

1) Information We Collect

  • Information you provide (if you submit a form): name, email, optional phone, vehicle type/price, and any message you include.
  • Usage and device info: IP address, browser/user agent, pages viewed, time on page. We may store campaign tags (e.g., utm_source) and simple cookies to remember settings.
  • Calculated outputs: payment estimates based on inputs (not a credit decision).

2) How We Use Information

  • To show calculator results and operate/improve the site.
  • To respond to your inquiries or requests.
  • To measure basic traffic and understand which pages or campaigns are working.

3) Sharing

We do not sell personal information. We do not share your information for targeted advertising. We may share limited data with service providers who host our site, store data, send emails, or provide basic analytics, and only so they can perform services for us. We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights.

4) Cookies & Tracking

We use a small number of cookies or similar technologies to keep basic preferences (e.g., calculator inputs) and to understand site usage. You can disable cookies in your browser; some features may work with reduced functionality.

5) Data Retention

  • Form submissions (contact/lead): up to 18 months, then deleted or anonymized.
  • Basic logs/analytics: up to 6 months in raw form; aggregated metrics may be kept longer.

6) Security

We use reasonable safeguards (HTTPS/TLS in transit, access controls, limited retention). No method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

7) Your Rights (U.S. & Canada, small-scale context)

  • Access/Correction/Deletion: You may request a copy of your personal information, ask us to correct it, or request deletion (subject to legal limits).
  • Opt-out of marketing: If we ever send marketing emails, you may opt out using the link in the email or by contacting us.
  • California (CCPA/CPRA): We do not “sell” or “share” personal information as defined by California law. If that changes, we will update this page and provide required opt-outs.
  • Canada (PIPEDA): You can contact us to access or correct your information and to ask questions about our privacy practices.

8) Children

Our site is not intended for children under 16, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from them.

9) International Use

We currently operate only in the United States and Canada. If you visit from elsewhere, your data may be processed in the U.S. or Canada where laws may differ from those in your location.

10) Changes

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If changes are material, we will post a notice on this page with a new “Last Updated” date.

11) Contact

Questions or requests? Email us at privacy@vibesforce.com
